content:
本件保存
會 員 委 設建庫 水 門石 DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
SHIHMEN
SDC - 5515
August 4, 1962
*
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment
Dear Mr. Li:
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1585 dated August 3, 1962 and the catalogue No. 4 attached thereto con- cerning the subject matter.
It is recommended by MKA that the equipment as shown in Mr. Johnson's letter be procured to assist Shihmen Project construction. We, therefore, re- quest your immediate arrangement with AID/C to acquire these equipment for Shihmen Project.
140.112.213.82
Your earliest action to the above will be highly appreciated. Please return the attached GSA catalogue to Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C after your use.
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
芝 的确,
W.11.1Km W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.8. 7 15475
V.O.
(2) HCL/mw
3 57
2.
GUSA
Enclosure in 1.1
cc : Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C S G. Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
48
國史饭 Academia Historica
$ 8/2

paragraphs.content: 會 員 委 設建庫 水 門石 DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1585 dated August 3, 1962 and the catalogue No. 4 attached thereto con- cerning the subject matter.

It is recommended by MKA that the equipment as shown in Mr. Johnson's letter be procured to assist Shihmen Project construction. We, therefore, re- quest your immediate arrangement with AID/C to acquire these equipment for Shihmen Project.
Your earliest action to the above will be highly appreciated. Please return the attached GSA catalogue to Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C after your use.
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.11.1Km W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
cc : Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C S G. Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
